channel.title: jsonpath on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in jsonpath on An old coder

item.title: Structuring JSON data
item.description: My new project has a lot of text data that is available in a .csv and spreadsheet files but not in any more useful format. I took the .csv data I had an created a sqllite .db file so I could use it to generate some queries to create a .json file which I will use to display the data but also to create the menu system. The original data is the modding documentation for a game.
